sentences.en: " I have it!'said John to Mary, " We can buy mother a nice comb for her birthday.
sentences.cn: ” 约翰对玛丽说 “ 我有办法了! 我们可以给妈妈买一把精美的梳子作生日礼物”.

sentences.en: Don't forget to comb your hair before you go out.
sentences.cn: 不要忘记临出门梳梳头.

sentences.en: I looked over this place with a fine - tooth comb.
sentences.cn: 我非常仔细地查看过这个地方.

sentences.en: I shave, brush my teeth, and comb my hair.
sentences.cn: 我洗脸, 刷牙, 梳头.

sentences.en: Melanie ran upstairs to comb her hair .
sentences.cn: 梅拉妮跑上楼去梳头发。

sentences.en: Melanie ran upstairs to comb her hair.
sentences.cn: 梅拉妮跑上楼去梳头发。

sentences.en: Please fetch me that comb, I want to dress my hair.
sentences.cn: 请把那梳子拿给我, 我要梳理一下头发.

sentences.en: Police experts are sifting all the evidence with a fine - tooth comb .
sentences.cn: 警方专门人员仔仔细细地 审查所 有证据.

sentences.en: She bent to retrieve her comb from the floor.
sentences.cn: 她弯腰从地上捡起她的梳子。

sentences.en: She pawed through her purse for a comb.
sentences.cn: 她在手提包里乱翻一气找梳子。

sentences.en: She tilted the mirror and began to comb her hair.
sentences.cn: 她斜过镜子开始梳理头发。

sentences.en: She was trying to comb some useful things out of the tangle.
sentences.cn: 她正试图从那堆乱糟糟的东西里找出些有用之物.

sentences.en: The sharp parts of a comb or a saw are called teeth.
sentences.cn: 梳子和锯子的尖锐部分叫作齿.

sentences.en: Then, I shave, brush my teeth and comb my hair.
sentences.cn: 然后, 我刮脸 、 刷牙和梳头.

sentences.en: We use a comb to tidy our hair.
sentences.cn: 我们用梳子来梳理头发.

sentences.en: Your hair needs a good comb.
sentences.cn: 你的头发得好好梳一梳.

sentences.en: Your hair's so tangled that I can't comb it.
sentences.cn: 你的头发太乱了,我梳不动.

words.tran_cn: 梳理；梳头；到处搜寻（comb的过去分词）

trans.tran_en: a flat piece of plastic, metal etc with a row of thin teeth on one side, used for making your hair tidy
to make hair look tidy using a comb

trans.tran_cn: 梳理； 在…搜寻； 彻底搜查
trans.tran_en: to make hair look tidy using a comb
